## Player.setInteractEnabled() method

Enables or disables interaction clicks/taps for this player.

Use for: cutscenes, menus, or temporary input blocking.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInteractEnabled(enabled: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

enabled


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

True to allow interactions, false to block them.

\*\*Category:\*\* Players


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
